p: In the event that dexamethasone is unavailable, it is reasonable to use alternative glucocorticoids, such as prednisone, methylprednisolone, and hydrocortisone. The total daily dose equivalencies to 6 mg/day of dexamethasone for these medications are 40 mg, 32 mg, and 160 mg, respectively. While current guidelines state that using these alternatives are appropriate, it is unclear whether they have the same benefit as dexamethasoneÂ [ 24].
